name: Preschool
description: Curriculum introduces children to the richness of global traditions and perspectives through joyful celebrations, storytelling, and conversation. They offer Spanish and French language classes to support this global mindset, giving children a fun and meaningful introduction to new sounds, words, and cultures. Also offer music classes, where children can explore rhythm, melody, movement, and creativity. Music becomes a joyful part of their day—and another way to express themselves and connect wit
